title: Arrow Park Ferry
description: Arrow Park Ferry. There will be required maintenance at Arrow Park. Starting Wed Dec 18 at 12:00 PM PST until Wed Dec 18 at 3:00 PM PST. Road closure planned. Next update time Wed Dec 18 at 3:00 PM PST. Last updated Wed Dec 11 at 5:19 PM PST. (DBC-71059)
Description: There will be required maintenance at Arrow Park. Road closure planned.

title: Big Bar Reaction Ferry
description: Big Bar Reaction Ferry. Travel advisory in effect at Big Bar Reaction Ferry (Big Bar Reaction Ferry). Road closed for the season. The Aerial Car is in operation for foot traffic only. Next update time Fri May 30, 2025. Last updated Tue Nov 19 at 9:13 AM PST. (DBC-70341)
Description: Road closed for the season. The Aerial Car is in operation for foot traffic only.

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Bridge maintenance between Mt Sicker Rd and Fuller Lake Rd for 3.7 km (Chemainus). Lane closures in both directions. Construction speed zone in effect. Southbound bridge closed for repairs. All Traffic diverted onto the adjacent bridge. No overwidth protocols in effect up to 4.4m. Next update time Mon Jan 20, 2025 at 7:00 AM PST. Last updated Fri Nov 29 at 9:22 PM PST. (DBC-70685)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), between Mt Sicker Rd and Fuller Lake Rd for 3.7 km (Chemainus)
Description: Bridge maintenance, lane closures in both directions, construction speed zone in effect. Southbound bridge closed for repairs. All Traffic diverted onto the adjacent bridge. No overwidth protocols in effect up to 4.4m.

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Construction work between Coburn St and Shuswap Ave for 0.7 km (Chase). From 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM PST on weekdays and Saturday. Blasting. Road closed intermittently. Watch for traffic control. Speed reduction to 60km/hr. Next update time Fri Dec 20 at 10:00 AM PST. Last updated Sun Dec 15 at 10:50 AM PST. (DBC-64961)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), between Coburn St and Shuswap Ave for 0.7 km (Chase)
Description: Construction work, blasting. Road closed intermittently. Watch for traffic control. Speed reduction to 60km/hr.

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Construction work between Old Sicamous Rd and Solsqua-Sicamous Rd for 2.0 km (Sicamous). From 9:00 AM to 3:00 PM PST on weekdays. Bridge closed. Fully closed 9am-3pm Mon-Fri. Alternate route via Hwy 97A and 97B. Single lane alternating traffic from 8pm-6am. Expect 20 min delays. Next update time Fri Dec 20 at 5:00 PM PST. Last updated Sun Dec 15 at 4:18 PM PST. (DBC-70490)
Description: Construction work between Old Sicamous Rd and Solsqua-Sicamous Rd for 2.0 km. Bridge closed. Fully closed 9am-3pm Mon-Fri. Alternate route via Hwy 97A and 97B. Single lane alternating traffic from 8pm-6am. Expect 20 min delays.

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Weather advisory in effect between Three Valley Frtg Rd and 14th St N for 165.8 km (16 km west of Revelstoke to Golden). Until Wed Dec 18 at 5:00 PM PST. Expect deteriorating conditions/visibility. Be prepared for short notice avalanche control/deposit removal closures. Consider alternate travel plans. Next update time Wed Dec 18 at 5:00 PM PST. Last updated Mon Dec 16 at 3:29 PM PST. (DBC-71186)

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Avalanche control work planned between Griffin Lake Avalanche Gate and Boulder Mtn Avalanche Gate for 18.2 km (6 to 24 km west of Revelstoke). Starting Wed Dec 18 at 6:00 AM PST for the next two hours. Road closure planned. Detour will not be available. Watch for traffic control personnel. Estimated time of re-opening Wed Dec 18 at 8:00 AM PST. Next update time Wed Dec 18 at 7:45 AM PST. Last updated Tue Dec 17 at 9:50 AM PST. (DBC-71208)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions between Griffin Lake Avalanche Gate and Boulder Mtn Avalanche Gate for 18.2 km (6 to 24 km west of Revelstoke)

title: Highway 17 Both Directions
description: Highway 17 (Patricia Bay Highway), in both directions. Construction work at Exit 18: Keating Cross Rd (Central Saanich). Until Tue Jul 1, 2025. Nighttime lane closures both directions. Access to Barbara Drive from Keating Cross Road and access to East Saanich, Martindale and Danica from Highway 17 permanently closed. Keating Cross Road southbound onramp to Highway 17 closed. Next update time Sat May 10, 2025 at 12:00 PM PDT. Last updated Thu Sep 26 at 12:08 PM PDT. (DBC-54341)

title: Highway 3 Both Directions
description: Highway 3 (Crowsnest Highway), in both directions. Travel advisory in effect between Sunday Summit and Frontage Rd for 32.3 km (Princeton). Until Wed Dec 18 at 8:00 AM PST. Freezing rain. Freezing rain is in the forecast. Travelers are advised to take extra precautions and be prepared for delays. Slow down and drive to conditions encountered. title: Highway 5
description:
Highway 5 (Coquihalla South). Travel advisory in effect between the start of Highway 5 (Coquihalla South) and Exit 290: Merritt for 111.2 km (2 km north of Hope to Merritt). Limited visibility with heavy snowfall. Freezing rain. Heavy snowfall with possible Freezing Rain is forecast.

title: Kootenay Lake Ferry Both Directions
description: Kootenay Lake Ferry, in both directions. Ferry is out of service between Balfour and Kootenay Bay. Schedule modification. Mon-Fri essential service Balfour sailings: 6:30AM, 8:10AM, 4:30PM, Kootenay Bay: 7:10AM, 9AM, 5:20PM. Sat-Sun Balfour sailings: 6:30AM, 9:40PM, Kootenay Bay: 7:10AM, 10:20PM. Essential service travelers board 1st, then general public. Emergency services accommodated. Next update time Wed Dec 18 at 9:00 AM PST. Last updated Mon Dec 16 at 8:37 AM PST. (DBC-69872)

title: McLure Ferry Both Directions
description: McLure Ferry, in both directions. Ferry is currently out of service between McLure Ferry and the end of McLure Ferry (McLure). Until Sun Dec 22 at 7:00 AM PST. Ferry route closed. Next update time Sun Dec 22 at 7:00 AM PST. Last updated Tue Dec 17 at 10:15 AM PST. (DBC-71211)

title: Other Roads
description: Johnston Bridge. Travel advisory in effect at Front St. In Quesnel. Johnston Bridge. Bridge is open to vehicles with gross vehicle weight rating of 10,000 kilograms or lower. Industrial traffic and heavy commercial traffic must detour via Plywood Rd and Maple Drive. Industrial traffic is not allowed to detour through Johnston Subdivision. Next update time Wed Apr 8, 2026 at 9:00 AM PDT. Last updated Thu Oct 17 at 6:39 AM PDT. (DBC-47311)
